question:
1. What is the output of this following code?
   System.out.println("10 plus 20 is " + 10 + 20);
   a. 10 plus 20 is 10
   b. This snippet of code will result in a compiler error.
   c. 10 plus 20 is 30
   d. 10 plus 20 is 1020

3. What is the result of the following expression? 1 + 3 / 2 – 7 % 3
   a. 4
   b. 2
   c. 1
   d. 5

4. What is the result of the following expression?
   “12” + 1 + 2
   a. 15
   b. "123"
   c. "1212"
   d. "15"
